name: Space Solitaire
description:
That japanese popular cartoon "Space Brothers" has become the card game of solitaire!
This game is the simplest "Easy operation Solitaire app"!
Enjoy solitaire with playing cards of the characters such as Muta and Hibito etc of the comic!

■ How to play
- You can clear all arranged card to put on four frame at the top right from aces to the same mark.
- To build up each foundation, in sequence and in suit, from the king through the ace.
- Card a series of overlap, is possible to move together.
- You can put in column no cards and King.
- Card will be dealt a new If you click on the deck of the upper right. If the cards will be end,you can play from the beginning.
